name: Predator.
description: This photo was taken using the light painting technique (Light painting is a long exposure technique with moving different light sources in front of the lens. You can also highlight objects or move the camera itself.) In Moscow in April 2020. Everything was done in real time in one shot without using Photoshop. Small color correction and frame rotation applied. Used a maglite flashlight with color filters and mirror. Photograph Specifications: live composite mode. | f 22 | ISO 100 | Olympus OM-D E-M1. Olympus 12-40mm f / 2,8 Pro 3456 x 3970.
